mapper.insert: insert into gom_bdw_msg (MSG_ID, ORDER_ID_LIST, AREA_ID, OPERACTION, STATE, STATE_DATE, CREATE_DATE, IS_REL_SEND,BELONGSYSTEM) values (SEQ_gom_bdw_msg.Nextval,#{orderIdList},#{areaId},#{operAction},#{state},sysdate,sysdate,#{isRelSend},#{belongSystem})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM gom_bdw_msg msg WHERE msg.msg_id = #{msgId}
mapper.update: UPDATE gom_bdw_msg msg SET msg.state = #{state} ,msg.state_date = SYSDATE WHERE msg.msg_id = #{msgId}
mapper.select: SELECT r.* FROM (SELECT MSG.MSG_ID, MSG.ORDER_ID_LIST, MSG.AREA_ID, MSG.OPERACTION, MSG.STATE, MSG.STATE_DATE, MSG.CREATE_DATE, MSG.IS_REL_SEND FROM GOM_BDW_MSG MSG WHERE MSG.STATE = '10A' AND MSG.BELONGSYSTEM = #{orderType} ORDER BY MSG.CREATE_DATE) r WHERE ROWNUM <= 50

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT wo.wo_id,wo.order_id,wo.wo_state,oo.order_state,ut.id,ut.tache_code,ut.tache_name,os.id as ps_id FROM gom_wo wo LEFT JOIN gom_order oo ON oo.order_id = wo.order_id LEFT JOIN gom_ps_2_wo_s ws ON ws.id = wo.ps_id LEFT JOIN gom_ps_2_ord_s os ON os.id = ws.ord_ps_id LEFT JOIN uos_tache ut ON ut.id = ws.tache_id WHERE ut.tache_code != 'CHILDFLOWWAIT' AND (oo.order_id = #{orderId} OR oo.parent_order_id = #{orderId}) ORDER BY wo.wo_id DESC ) r WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT oo.order_id FROM gom_order oo WHERE oo.parent_order_id = #{orderId} AND oo.order_state = '200000002'
